heading: Today
text: Becoming mostly cloudy. A chance of snow showers north in the afternoon. Not as cold. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s. Light wind becoming south near 10 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: A few scattered snow showers in the north and over the Green Mountains. Lows in the teens to near 20, some single digits in the cold hollows in the northeast. Light wind turning northwest.

heading: Sunday
text: Pockets of sunshine in the morning, then mostly cloudy. An increasing chance of snow showers west of the Greens late. Highs from the teens to near 20 in the north, increasing to the mid to upper 20s in the south.
